Title: AN ACT LIMITING THE RATE OF SALARY OR WAGE WHICH AN EMPLOYEE OR LABORER OF THE GOVERNMENT MARINE RAILWAY AND REPAIR SHOPS EMPLOYED UNDER ACT NUMBERED FORTY- ONE HUNDRED AND ELEVEN MAY RECEIVE.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 165, November 09, 1936 ]
AN ACT LIMITING THE RATE OF SALARY OR WAGE WHICH AN EMPLOYEE OR LABORER OF THE GOVERNMENT MARINE RAILWAY AND REPAIR SHOPS EMPLOYED UNDER ACT NUMBERED FORTY- ONE HUNDRED AND ELEVEN MAY RECEIVE.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. Unless otherwise specifically provided in the annual Appropriation Act, no employee or laborer of the Government Marine Railway and Repair Shops employed under Act Numbered Forty-one hundred and eleven shall be paid more than ten pesos per day or more than two hundred and fifty pesos per month.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, November 9, 1936.
